templates.title: VMIS-HRMS SaaS Template
templates.description: Dynamic HRMS system with vendor management - perfect for SaaS deployment
templates.note: This template creates a branded HRMS instance for a specific client. Each deployment gets its own container with custom branding.

env.name: NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_BRAND_PREFIX
env.label: Company Brand Prefix
env.description: Company name/code that will appear in the UI (e.g., VDC, ABC, XYZ)

env.name: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
env.label: API URL
env.description: Full URL where the application will be accessible

env.name: CONTAINER_NAME
env.label: Container Name
env.description: Unique name for this container instance

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Domain Name
env.description: Domain where the application will be accessible

env.name: PORT
env.label: External Port
env.description: Port to expose the application on
